name: Shipwrecked (IstalriSkolirProductions)
description:
This game was developed during a 48 hour game jam, the theme was 'New Beginnings'.

You have been shipwrecked by a storm, rebuild your life on the island by harvesting its natural resources to rebuild the decrepit huts for you to live in!

Controls:

movement: WASD

Look: Mouse

Pick up item: E

Drop Item: Q

Use Item: Left Mouse Click

Twitter: @JohnTheScout

Email: JohnCWeightman@Gmail.com

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
